Hero.title: Smart Prompt Manager
Hero.description: Easily manage and optimize your AI prompts

Features.title: Core Features
Features.description: Making prompt management simpler and smarter
Features.collectionDesc: One-click collection from browser extension, automatic usage history tracking, and quick access to historical prompts
Features.optimizationDesc: Multiple optimization frameworks to automatically enhance prompts for different scenarios and improve output quality
Features.tagsDesc: Custom tag categories, multi-dimensional organization, tag search and filtering for managing massive prompt collections
Features.evaluationDesc: Multiple baseline model evaluations, detailed assessment reports to help continuously improve prompt quality
Features.personalizationDesc: English/Chinese interface and light/dark theme switching, automatic system adaptation for comfortable usage
Features.settingsDesc: Custom API and model configurations, flexible access token and usage limit settings for various scenarios

QuickStart.title: Quick Start
QuickStart.description: Start using smart prompts in just a few simple steps

FAQ.title: FAQ
FAQ.description: Learn more about Smart Prompt features and usage

general.question: What is Smart Prompt?
general.answer: Smart Prompt is an intelligent prompt management and optimization tool that helps you collect, manage, optimize, and evaluate AI prompts. With the browser extension, you can easily save and use prompts, enhance prompt effectiveness through various optimization frameworks, and evaluate performance using multiple baseline models.

collection.question: How to collect and manage prompts?
collection.answer: You can save prompts with one click using our browser extension or create them directly on the web interface. The system automatically records prompt usage history, and you can quickly search by title, tags, or content. All prompts support public sharing or private saving.

optimization.question: Which optimization frameworks are supported?
optimization.answer: We support multiple mainstream optimization frameworks, including PromptWizard, APE, BROKE, CRISPE, etc. Each framework has its characteristics and use cases. For example, PromptWizard is suitable for standardization scenarios, APE for automation scenarios, and BROKE for enterprise applications.

evaluation.question: How to evaluate prompt effectiveness?
evaluation.answer: You can use the evaluation feature to test prompt effectiveness. The system supports multiple baseline models, including GPT-4, Claude 3, etc. You can set expected outputs, and the system will generate detailed evaluation reports to help you continuously improve prompt quality.

tags.question: How to use tags to manage prompts?
tags.answer: You can add multiple tags to each prompt and support custom tag categories. You can filter and search by tags, and sort by update time, creation time, and other dimensions. This helps better organize and manage large numbers of prompts.

personalization.question: What personalization options are available?
personalization.answer: The system supports English/Chinese interface switching and automatically follows the system's light/dark theme. You can also customize API and model configurations, set access tokens and usage limits to fully meet personalized usage needs.

token.question: Why do I need to set up an access token?
token.answer: Access tokens are used for API access and authentication. You need to configure a token in the settings page to use optimization and evaluation features. Token information is stored securely and will not be leaked to other users.

privacy.question: Is my prompt data secure?
privacy.answer: We take data security very seriously. You can choose to set prompts as private or public. Private prompts are accessible only to you, while public prompts can be viewed and used by other users. All data transmission is encrypted.

extension.question: How to install and use the browser extension?
extension.answer: You can install our browser extension from the Chrome Web Store. After installation, select text on any webpage and click the extension icon to save it as a prompt with one click. Saved prompts will automatically sync to your account.
